news.title: John Magnier’s bid to force through €15m purchase of Barne Estate is dismissed by High Court
news.summary: Bloodstock billionaire John Magnier has lost a legal action in which he was seeking to push through the purchase for €15m of Barne Estate, a 751-acre Golden Vale tillage farm and mansion.

news.title: Family of farmer Joe Grogan, who died one day after marriage, freeze multi-million-euro estate as widow hosts Ploughing Championships
news.summary: The family of the late Joe Grogan have placed a legal freeze on the administration of his multi-­million-euro estate as a bitter dispute with his widow rages on.

news.title: Race to the Áras: Gareth Sheridan wins Kerry nomination but will no longer address Dublin councillors tonight
news.summary: Independent candidates are continuing their pitches to local councillors throughout today in a bid to secure the backing of four councils needed to get their name on the ballot.

news.title: Tipperary man charged with assault causing harm as elderly man dies of injuries
news.summary: A Tipperary man in his 30s appeared before Nenagh District Court on Monday charged with assault causing harm on an elderly man who has subsequently died of his injuries.

news.title: Mary Regan: County Councils hold more sway than White House and Elon Musk as Conor McGregor throws in the towel
news.summary: It ended not with a bang, but with a whimper.

news.title: ‘I’m waiting for hidden cameras to pop out and tell us it’s all a big joke’ – Mayo family collect their €17m lotto jackpot
news.summary: A family syndicate from Co Mayo are pinching themselves after discovering they won the third-largest jackpot in lotto history, scooping just over €17 million.

news.title: ‘She’s the best’ – Katie Taylor’s husband speaks out for the first time since marriage to Irish boxing great
news.summary: Katie Taylor’s new husband has spoken out for the first time about the love of his life, saying: “she’s the best!”.

news.title: Met Éireann issues status yellow rain warning for five counties as heavy showers forecast
news.summary: Met Éireann has issued a status yellow rain warning for five counties.

news.title: Usain Bolt interview: ‘When I walk up stairs I get out of breath’
news.summary: There were flashes of the trademark charisma, not least when Usain Bolt bluntly assessed why his times remain unrivalled, but also no mistaking Superman’s return to normality.

news.title: Michael Houghton: ‘When you have a mortgage on a buy-to-let property, as we do, positive cash flow is rare’
news.summary: I dropped a friend home one evening after a late night out. He had just returned from the US and was back living in Ireland. He was renting while waiting for his new house to be built. It was a very nice house, in a good neighbourhood in Limerick.
